DOC.detailed_description: A randomize controlled clinical trial involve patient 0-3 yrs old type 1 diabetes . After successful screening subject randomize one two group : CSII group alone CSII group + Real Time Sensor Augmentation group ( RTSA ) group . The CSII group serve control CSII+RTSA group . The trial last one year .
